alert.note: Alert for Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 2:43AM CDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Rock River near Hardwick affecting Rock County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Rock River near Hardwick. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, the lower left bank overflows flooding low lying agricultural lands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:30 AM CDT Monday was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Rock River Hardwick 14.0 14.3 Mon 2 am MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 445 AM CDT.
